gg.al.game

Class PlayerHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • gg.al.game.PlayerHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable

    public class PlayerHelper
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Created by Thomas Neumann on 07.06.2017.
    Helper class for exposing entity related variables to the UI-system.
    Also contains TextureRegion for current health, resource and cooldowns.
